Latent AI

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_divider divider_weight=”2px” _builder_version=”4.16″ module_alignment=”center” height=”0px” custom_margin=”-5px||” custom_padding=”||” global_colors_info=”{}”] [/et_pb_divider][et_pb_text ul_type=”none” admin_label=”Founders with Links to the LinkedIn” _builder_version=”4.19.4″ text_text_color=”#425868″ ul_text_color=”#425868″ ul_font_size=”22px” header_font=”|500|||||||” header_text_align=”left” header_text_color=”#38423d” header_font_size=”24″ max_width=”95%” module_alignment=”center” custom_margin=”||10px” hover_enabled=”0″ global_colors_info=”{}” header_2_text_color=”#38423D” header_2_font_size=”24px” sticky_enabled=”0″]

Founders

  • Jags Kandasamy – Co-Founder & CEO
  • Sek Chai – Co-Founder & CTO

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_divider divider_weight=”2px” _builder_version=”4.16″ module_alignment=”center” height=”0px” custom_margin=”-5px||” custom_padding=”||” global_colors_info=”{}”] [/et_pb_divider][et_pb_text admin_label=”Description” _builder_version=”4.19.4″ text_text_color=”#425868″ text_font_size=”22px” header_font=”|500|||||||” header_text_align=”left” header_text_color=”#38423d” header_font_size=”24″ max_width=”95%” module_alignment=”center” hover_enabled=”0″ global_colors_info=”{}” header_2_text_color=”#38423D” header_2_font_size=”24px” sticky_enabled=”0″]

Description

Latent AI is a technology spinout from SRI International, based on years of DARPA research. Latent AI transforms the way developers train AI for inference with our Adaptive AI™ technology that enables rapid AI application development and deployment to lean edge devices at scale. Their groundbreaking approach works anywhere and seamlessly adapts, regardless of framework, OS, architecture or edge hardware.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_divider divider_weight=”2px” _builder_version=”4.16″ module_alignment=”center” height=”0px” custom_margin=”-5px||” custom_padding=”||” global_colors_info=”{}”] [/et_pb_divider][et_pb_text admin_label=”Industry/Sector” _builder_version=”4.19.4″ text_text_color=”#425868″ text_font_size=”22px” header_font=”|500|||||||” header_text_align=”left” header_text_color=”#38423d” header_font_size=”24″ max_width=”95%” module_alignment=”center” hover_enabled=”0″ global_colors_info=”{}” header_2_text_color=”#38423D” header_2_font_size=”24px” sticky_enabled=”0″]

Industry

Cross-sector – AI/ML

Vintage

IIF 1

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.2.1″ custom_margin=”0px||” custom_padding=”4%|0|4%|0|true|false” global_module=”1905″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ custom_padding=”|||” global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_button button_url=”https://blackhornvc.com/portfolio/” button_text=”Back To Complete Portfolio” button_alignment=”center” admin_label=”Back to Portfolio Button” _builder_version=”4.16″ custom_button=”on” button_text_size=”24px” button_text_color=”#7dcbb6″ button_border_width=”0px” button_border_color=”rgba(0,0,0,0)” button_icon=”J||divi||400″ custom_margin=”0px||0px” custom_padding=”0px||0px” global_colors_info=”{}”]
